entry.title: Bitcoin Knots 29.2.knots20251010 released
entry.summary:
The latest release of Bitcoin Knots, version 29.2.knots20251010, is now officially available for download. This new version can be accessed through the provided [link](https://bitcoinknots.org/files/29.x/29.2.knots20251010/) and introduces several critical bug fixes alongside the inclusion of a new Dockerfile. For those encountering issues or wishing to report bugs, the developers have facilitated a direct channel through their GitHub issue tracker, accessible via this [link](https://github.com/bitcoinknots/bitcoin/issues). Additionally, individuals interested in staying updated with announcements or participating in discussions are encouraged to join the mailing list, details of which can be found [here](https://bitcoinknots.org/list/announcements/join/).
For an in-depth understanding of the updates and changes introduced in this release, the full release notes are made available on GitHub. They provide comprehensive insights into the enhancements and fixes brought by version 29.2.knots20251010, ensuring users are well-informed about the modifications impacting their use of the software. These notes can be reviewed at the following [link](https://github.com/bitcoinknots/bitcoin/releases/tag/v29.2.knots20251010), offering a transparent overview of the development efforts and improvements.
